txt.en: 'You fought back the Easterling assault, and devastated the Orcs encamped in the forest nearby who came from East Wall. A party left for East Wall to investigate the Orc presence there, and you should find them to continue what you started here. Should you find yourself in the area, you are always more than welcome here.\n\n'Look for Léomund just over the border with the East Wall. He travelled with Mansig, and may be able to tell you where they are encamped.'
'You are here to help? Very good! Mansig and the rest of my people could use your help here in the East Wall!'
A party of Rohirrim headed south from the Wold to investigate the Orc presence in East Wall.
Find and speak to Léomund in East Wall
Léomund is just south of the southern border of the Wold, in East Wall.\n\nYou have been told to assist Léomund in the East Wall against the Orcs.
